select idx,name,email,passwd, contents,TO_CHAR(post_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS post_date from guestbook where name like #{search} or contents like #{search} order by idx desc
mapper.insert: insert into guestbook (idx, name, email, passwd, contents, post_date) values (guestbook_seq.nextVal, #{name}, #{email}, #{passwd}, #{contents}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: select idx,name,email,passwd,contents,TO_CHAR(post_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS post_date from guestbook where idx=#{idx}
